chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This End-user guide documents the installation, configuration and use of the Example Web GIS Application based on the Geomajas SmartGWT client.

section.title: What is it?
section.para: The Example Application is a stand-alone, ready-to-use Web GIS solution. After installation, you can work with the pre-configured sample data layers or you can start adding your own data sources.
The Application has out-of-the-box functionality for navigating the map, searching data, measuring, feature info, etc.

section.title: Who can use it?
section.para: The Example Application is made as such that it can be used by anybody with average computer skills with and a basic understanding of GIS. No special system administration and programming skills are required.
